# HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.off

**Case**

The accessory indicates no heating or cooling.

## Declaration

```swift
case off
```

## Temperature States

- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.cool**: The accessory state indicates cooling.
- **HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.heat**: The accessory state indicates heating.
title: HMCharacteristicValueCurrentHeatingCooling.off
